inclusion.criterion: Open abdominal surgery under general anaesthesia with a planned operation time of at least 120 minutes
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Arrhythmia; atrial fibrillation or multiple extra systoles
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

exclusion.criterion: Aortic - or mitral insufficiency with hemodynamic influence
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

exclusion.criterion: Patients who at the preoperative visit by the responsible anaesthesiologist is planned for a more advanced cardiovascular monitoring.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patients with a pulmonary or other disease that prevents ventilation using a tidal volume of 7 ml/kg (ideal weight) or a positive end expiratory pressure of 5 -10 cm H2O
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

exclusion.criterion: Contra indication against synthetic colloids as severely impaired renal or liver function, hyper natremia or allergy to synthetic colloids
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

notes: The patient is a 55 year old man with lower urinary tract symptoms. He has no significant medical history and his recent blood chemistry was normal.
